description: Get parent/ancestor messages in a thread for Gmail-like conversation view

functions.name: getThreadParents
functions.description: Get all parent messages in a thread chain, from root to current message

parameters.name: weMsgId
parameters.description: WebExtension message ID of the current message

maxMessages.description: Maximum number of parent messages to return (default: 10)

includeBody.description: Whether to include message body content (default: true)

bodyMaxLength.description: Maximum body length per message in characters (default: 2000)

functions.name: getThreadMessages
functions.description: Get all messages in the Thunderbird thread containing the given message (does not rely on threadParent chain).

parameters.name: weMsgId
parameters.description: WebExtension message ID of the current message

maxMessages.description: Maximum number of thread messages to return (default: 50)
